page.title: 02Newburgh's Shops
page.content: The main shops in Newburgh are the grocery and paper shops. Strachan's the paper shop is just about in the middle of the High Street, but there is another paper shop called Newmans. The main grocery shop in Newburgh is called the Lairds Larder.There was another grocery shop but it is now a freezer store. There are two places in Newburgh where you can get coffee one is in the Institute the other is a small shop in the High Street. There are two fish and chip shops in Newburgh, one is at the bottom of the High Street.The other one is in the middle of the High Street. The large shops in Newburgh are the CO OP and the VG store.
